About.title: About Us
About.title1: Welcome to a new dimension of interior design
About.title2: where your imagination leads the way !
About.txt1: Our innovative 3D room modeling platform empowers you to craft the perfect living spaces tailored exactly to your preferences and lifestyle.
About.txtMid: Simply provide your room measurements and choose from a diverse range of furniture,design your walls, doors, and windows just as you envision them.
About.txt2: Not sure how a piece of furniture will look in your room? Simply upload a picture of the item, and place it in your virtual room to see how it complements your design.
